question: A man looks at a woman and as a result a substance is released from his Private part is this substance regarded as Mazi?
answer:
QUESTION

I would like to know looks or thinks about a women and as a result a substance is released from his privart part is this substance regatrded in the shaiat as mazi or mani and does the person have to take a bath after this

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

The liquid emission is mazi. It is impure. The private part and the area soiled with mazi will have to be washed. The soiled portion of the undergarment will have to be washed. Mazi invalidates wudhu and not the ghusal.

And Allah knows best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
